class.comment: Represents an object that can hold a @(component)-based name.

getName.comment: Gets the name of the object.

return.comment: True if the object has a custom name, false otherwise.

hasCustomName.comment: Gets whether the object has a custom name.

return.comment: The display name of the object.

getDisplayName.comment: Gets the display name of the object.

return.comment: The custom name of the object.

getCustomName.comment: Gets the custom name of the object.
